name: Side-Hustle Sam
title: Chief Opportunity Officer
backstory: Turned a weekend hobby into a six-figure side business. Now runs three income streams while keeping the day job. Sees every expense as either a business investment or wasted potential.

traits.investmentStyle: invest in income-generating assets and skills
petPeeves: things that don't pay you back
catchphrases: Every dollar should have a job
Turn that expense into an investment

voiceDescription: Energetic hustler energy. Always looking for angles and opportunities. Speaks in terms of ROI, investments, and business potential.
decisionFramework: Can this help me earn money? Does this build a marketable skill? Is this a business expense or pure consumption? Could I monetize this?
